sentences.en: A generator transforms mechanical energy into electricity.
sentences.cn: 发电机将机械能变成电.

sentences.en: A special generator transmits electricity to all parts of the factory.
sentences.cn: 一台专门的发电机把电力输送到工厂的各个角落.

sentences.en: All the while the giant generator poured out its power.
sentences.cn: 巨大的发电机一刻不停地发出电力.

sentences.en: Do they want to know they can use the electric generator?
sentences.cn: 他们想知道他们是否能用发电机?

sentences.en: During by the steam engine drive, the electric generator can generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 由蒸汽机驱动时, 发电机可以发电.

sentences.en: Gas generator rocket can pressurize a high - pressure feed system.
sentences.cn: 燃气发生器能使高压输送系统增压.

sentences.en: The company has been a very good cash generator.
sentences.cn: 这家公司盈利状况一直相当好。

sentences.en: The demodulator receives its reference voltage from the signal - generator voltage supply.
sentences.cn: 解调器的参考电压由电信号发生器电压电源供给.

sentences.en: The generator has started up / broken down.
sentences.cn: 发电机已开动[出现故障].

sentences.en: The giant generator could be back in service.
sentences.cn: 巨大的发电机可以重新使用了.

sentences.en: The handdriven generator is equipped with a centrifugal governor.
sentences.cn: 手摇直流发电机装有离心调速装置.

sentences.en: The hospital has a backup generator in case there is a power failure.
sentences.cn: 医院有备用发电机以防停电.

sentences.en: The shaft of the turbine is coupled to the rotor of the generator.
sentences.cn: 汽轮机的轴与发电机转子相连结.

sentences.en: They have a generator when the electricity fails.
sentences.cn: 他们有一台发电机，以备停电时所需。

sentences.en: This is an alternating current generator.

words.tran_cn: 生殖的；生产的；有生殖力的；有生产力的
[电]发电机；[计][制冷]发生器；生产者

trans.tran_cn: 发电机，发生器，电力公司，生产者，创始者，[乐]基础低音
